title: Pepper - Kona Gold (MP3 320kbps)
description:
On the West Side of the Big Island, in the middle of the
sea, is a small Drinking Village with a Fishing Problem
where everything is Lazy Green. It's where we come
from. It's called KONA TOWN...The number one exporter
of the Stone Love Sound. We licked it back, and look
what we found: alive, all Live and thriving in our home
stomping ground...Grown here, not flown here...
Before we came In With The Old...
We harvested this...sssmokin...
KONA GOLD

When we are far from The Islands, they are never far
from us. This is an arsenal of favorites from the back of
the bus...delivered live and direct 2,000 miles away
from The Rock we grew up on to the Boulder where we
stay. After a decade of touring, after ten years on the
road, we still take Hawaii Nei with us wherever we go.
Pan-Pacific, Trans-Atlantic...
there's still no place like home!
So we packed you this fatty...
Enjoy KONA GOLD

Live album by rock-reggae band Pepper.
All files MP3 @ 320kbps. Album artwork included.

Seed!
